text:
#Chloroquine & #Hydroxychloroquine can cause neuromuscular #toxicity (#myopathy or peripheral #neuropathy).
Photo: acid-phosphatase +ve vacuolar (red spots)myopathy in a pt with #Chloroquine myopathy(lysosomal dysfunction). #COVIDー19 #Coronavirus #Pathology @TheMyositisAssc https://t.co/fCawE7w5Um
